sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Find groups for non members</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function getGroupsWithoutMember(userID){
	var grGroup = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
grGroup.addEncodedQuery('RLQUERYsys_user_grmember.group,=0^sys_id=' + userID + '^ENDRLQUERY'); // related list query + mtm
grGroup.query();

while (grGroup.next()){
gs.log(grGroup.getDisplayValue());
}
gs.log(grGroup.getRowCount());
}

function getGroupsWithoutMemberGR(userID){
	var groupIDs = '';
	var groupsWithMember = GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
	groupsWithMember.addQuery('user', userID);
	groupsWithMember.query();
	while (groupsWithMember.next()){
		groupIDs += groupsWithMember.group.sys_id.toString() + ",";
	}
	var groupsWithoutMember = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
	groupsWithoutMember.addQuery('sys_id', 'NOT IN', groupIDs);
	groupsWithoutMember.query();
	gs.log(groupsWithoutMember.getRowCount());
	while(groupsWithoutMember.next()){
		gs.log(groupsWithoutMember.getDisplayValue());
	}
	
}
getGroupsWithoutMember('6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441');]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-08-17 17:06:56</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>29497dba2f5d9110d8a4d5f62799b619</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>26</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Find groups for non members</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_29497dba2f5d9110d8a4d5f62799b619</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-08-17 21:01:17</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
